hero.intro: Currently in a Bachelor's in web and application development, after a BTS SIO option SLAM, I have real experience in development and QA testing: test automation for an Android and Windows application, development of a professional website with Symfony, and self-hosting projects on Linux and Raspberry Pi. I design modern end-to-end applications, from code to deployment.

about_section.title: About
about_section.p1: My name is Quentin Perriere and I am a web & application developer, currently finishing a Bachelor's degree after a BTS SIO (SLAM option). I work on both backend (PHP/Symfony, REST APIs, databases) and frontend (React, Next.js, Tailwind, WordPress) with strong interest in automated testing and software quality.
about_section.p2: I had the opportunity to work as a QA tester on Android and Windows apps, and as a web developer on a professional Symfony website. I also have a strong interest in Linux, servers and self-hosting, especially using Raspberry Pi and Cloudflare Tunnel.
about_section.p3: I’m described as rigorous, adaptable and organized, comfortable working in teams and able to keep calm under pressure. I'm passionate about web development, Linux systems, hardware and video games, which also inspire my personal projects.
